name: DEJA WHO
description:
Find the alien amongst the humans. Swipe left if the "human" is not who you're looking for. Swipe right if it is. Mistakes are inexcusable and may result in immediate discharge. Pay attention to small detail. Everything matters.

Feel the thrill of swiping through the wrong matches until you find the one that is your match... and detain them.

- Fluid swiping technology
- Randomly generated characters
- No Aliens allowed
- Unlock different theme packs with coins collected from detainees!
- Game Center
